StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertOrUpdateCampusContactUsingGuid]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@CampusContactID uniqueiden..er, @CollegePro.leID uniqueiden..er, @SchoolCode uniqueiden..er, @FiscalYear int, @PointOfContactID uniqueiden..er, @UserLogin varchar(50)
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @SchoolCodeint int
BEGIN TRANSACTION
Select @SchoolCodeint = School_Code FROM High_School hs where hs.rowguid = @SchoolCode
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [USMC].[CollegePro.le] where CollegePro.leID = @CollegePro.leID and @CollegePro.leID IS NOT NULL)
BEGIN INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.le] ([CollegePro.leID],[SCHOOL_CODE], [FiscalYear], [UserLogin], [UpdateDate]) VALUES (@CollegePro.leID,@SchoolCodeint,@FiscalYear, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END
IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [USMC].CampusContact WHERE CampusContactID = @CampusContactID)
BEGIN UPDATE CampusContact SET [CollegePro.leID] = @CollegePro.leID, [PointOfContactID] = @PointOfContactID, [UserLogin] = @UserLogin
WHERE CampusContactID = @CampusContactID
END
ELSE
BEGIN INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[CampusContact] ([CampusContactID],
[CollegePro.leID] ,[PointOfContactID], [UserLogin] ,[UpdateDate])
VALUES (@CampusContactID, @CollegePro.leID, @PointOfContactID, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END
-- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
COMMIT TRANSACTION
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
